quote: It can be anything, actually. Something maybe like the top things that I hear in terms of topics or things that I've heard on the news or that other people have told me. If there are topics that I'm not familiar with, then I will search for them to gain a better understanding.
Searching for information, learning about different topics, and planning.
Planning for trips or personal projects.
Accurate and up-to-date information that is intuitive. They explain things in a way that I can understand very easily.
Understand the context at angle and the depth of information that I want, and give me the right level.
Yes, I would like AI to be connected with my calendar, email, and messaging apps. Then I can integrate the information in the AI with the apps that I use very often.

For example, if I make some plans, it will automatically mark them in my calendar and send an email or note or message to notify the people involved. It will also remind me when the events are happening in advance.
Yeah, I think it's fine, but it feels more distant than personal.
Because I'm talking to a machine rather than a person.
